title: 95/19/EC: Commission Decision of 2 February 1995 deferring, as regards the importation of ornamental plant propagating material and ornamental plants from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Directive 91/682/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 February 1995 deferring, as regards the importation of ornamental plant propagating material and ornamental plants from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Directive 91/682/EEC (95/19/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date referred to in Article 16 (2), first subparagraph of Directive 91/682/EEC is hereby deferred until 31 December 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 376, 31. 12. 1991, p. 21.
(2) OJ No L 66, 10. 3. 1994, p. 32.
